title: 309: BIP Finale w/ Blake Horstmann
itunes:title: 309: BIP Finale w/ Blake Horstmann
description:
The Broads are joined by very special guest, Blake Horstmann (Bachelorette Season 14/BIP Season 6), for the Bachelor in Paradise Finale! Blake gives The Broads his perspective from first hand BIP experience, talks about his time on the sand, and how he almost went on this season! They chat thoughts on the final couples, the very surprising couples post paradise, the Dale/Abigail/Clare drama, BTS conversations, and much more! 

 

BLAKE HORSTMANN:

Follow him on Instagram here: https://www.instagram.com/balockaye.h/

Listen to his podcast “Behind the Rose” here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/behind-the-rose/id1529054291

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:
